Description: 
This application implements a command called "PlotNetSample"  to demonstrate the use of the plot interfaces.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "DotNetSamples.sln"ï¼Œthen build the application.

To use PlotSample.dll:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing and draw some entities.
2. Run NETLOAD command and load the PlotSample.dll file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "PlotNetSample" command. Select the printer, paper and print style from the list on the dialog box, and then click "Plot" button. The printed file is saved in the document directory.
